title: Repeals provision prohibiting volunteer firefighters from receiving both the local option real property tax exemption and the personal income tax credit at the same time
summary: Repeals provision prohibiting volunteer firefighters from receiving both the local option real property tax exemption and the personal income tax credit at the same time.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3908

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 28, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. MOLINARO, McKEVITT, HAWLEY, KATZ, CORWIN, MONTES-
         ANO, RABBITT, RAIA, GIGLIO, P. LOPEZ -- Multi-Sponsored by -- M. of A.
         BARCLAY,  BURLING,  CALHOUN,  CASTELLI,  CONTE,  DUPREY, FINCH, HAYES,
         JORDAN, KOLB, OAKS, SAYWARD, TEDISCO -- read once and referred to  the
         Committee on Ways and Means

       AN ACT to repeal paragraph (2) of subsection (e-1) of section 606 of the
         tax law, relating to tax credit for volunteer firefighters

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Paragraph 2 of subsection (e-1) of section 606 of  the  tax
    2  law is REPEALED.
    3    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.







        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD08272-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to repeal paragraph (2) of subsection (e-1) of section 606 of the tax law, relating to tax credit for volunteer firefighters
